bibl.title: The Burning of a Monastery? Story Blazed on the Walls of Monastic Buildings at Nekloni (Naqlun).
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: The walls of the monastery of Naqlun bear evidence of a fire that destroyed some parts of the complex at the end of the 10th century or at the very beginning of the 11th century. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Szymon Maślak, The Burning of a Monastery? Story Blazed on the Walls of Monastic Buildings at Nekloni (Naqlun).
A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 149-186, 28 figg.

The walls of the monastery of Naqlun bear evidence of a fire that destroyed some parts of the complex at the end of the 10th century or at the very beginning of the 11th century. - Avec résumé en anglais.
